Text saved: Etiquette means rules for how to act in a polite way.

Business happens in many countries now. Most business people speak English. But how people talk in business is different. It is different in every country. We need to know the etiquette of other countries. If we do not know these rules, there can be problems. We can think bad things about people. We can not understand them. Talking can stop. There are three main differences. These are about business etiquette in the world. They can help you. They help when you work with people from other countries.
